attributes.action: Re-introduce the death penalty for acts of terrorism in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today, July 11th 2007,four men convicted of the 21 July 2005 bomb plot have been jailed for life, with a minimum tariff of 40 years each.
This means that you and I will be paying to keep these people locked up for the next 40 years.
The judge said these men made "a viable attempt at mass murder "  Attempted murder of innocent human beings going about their daily lives.Why should those same human beings,who were nearly blown up two years ago,along with the rest of the british public,any of whom could have been victims of terrorism,now have to pay for the upkeep of these 'animals' whose only aim in life is to kill innocent people. ACTS OF TERRORISM MUST BE PUNISHABLE BY THE DEATH SENTENCE
